DOC.brief_summary: The investigator examine effect dexmedetomidine management pain uterine artery embolization .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Dexmedetomidine Management Pain After Uterine Artery Embolization
DOC.detailed_description: Leiomyoma common female reproductive tract tumor . Uterine artery embolization ( UAE ) minimally invasive treatment alternative hysterectomy myomectomy . However , post-procedural pain control UAE remain major problem . Therefore , aim study evaluate efficacy dexmedetomidine pain control UAE .
DOC.criteria: age ≥ 20 , ASA class I II bradycardia ( < 45 bpm ) heart block liver failure renal failure uncontrolled hypertension body mass index ≥ 30 kg/m2
